meanings.definition: Able to be translated from one language to another.
meanings.sent1: The book was translatable into many languages.
meanings.sent2: The translatable document was easily understood by people from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so translatable that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as translatable as a universal language.
meanings.sent5: The concept was made translatable through simple illustrations.

meanings.definition: Capable of being expressed or understood in another form or medium.
meanings.sent1: His emotions were translatable through his music.
meanings.sent2: The translatable message resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The idea was so translatable that it sparked creativity in others.
meanings.sent4: Her art was as translatable as a picture book.
meanings.sent5: The story became translatable through the power of storytelling.
